JOB.DESCRIPTION: Transmisión de ficheros count de intervinientes APX-Datio
JOB.INSTREAM_JCL: #!/usr/bin/ksh -v CDDIR=/NDM36/cdunix/ NDMAPICFG=$CDDIR/ndm/cfg/cliapi/ndmapi.cfg fecha=$1 export NDMAPICFG set -v $CDDIR/ndm/bin/direct -x << EOJ submit maxdelay=unlimited procUNX process snode=CDLCVWPEAXFT01 stepUNX1 copy from (pnode file=/fichtemcomp/datsal/de/KSAN_PARTICIPANTS_COUNT_${fecha}_*.dat sysopts='strip.blanks=no:datatype=binary:' ) to (snode file=/in/staging/de/oracle/ksan/ disp=rpl sysopts='strip.blanks=no:datatype=binary:' ) COMPRESS EXTENDED valida1 if (stepUNX1 = 0) then borra run task (pgm=unix) pnode sysopts='rm -f /fichtemcomp/datsal/de/KSAN_PARTICIPANTS_COUNT_${fecha}_*.dat' eif pend; EOJ SAVE=$? echo $SAVE if [[ $SAVE > 0 ]] then echo 'Error:$SAVE' exit 1 fi echo 'No error' exit 0

DOMAIL.SUBJECT: KSAN Error en la ejecución del Job %%JOBNAME - %%$ODATE
